properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_SCRAP ( SCRAP_NO, MEM_NO, IBOARD_NO, CREATE_DATE, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_SC_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ? )

SELECT SC.MEM_NO, IBOARD_NO, SC.STATUS FROM TB_SCRAP SC JOIN TB_ITEMBOARD IB ON SC.IBOARD_NO = IB.BOARD_NO JOIN TB_MEMBER MEM ON SC.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO WHERE MEM.STATUS != 'N' AND IB.STATUS = 'Y' AND SC.MEM_NO = ? AND IBOARD_NO = ?

SELECT SC.STATUS FROM TB_SCRAP SC JOIN TB_ITEMBOARD IB ON SC.IBOARD_NO = IB.BOARD_NO JOIN TB_MEMBER MEM ON SC.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO WHERE MEM.STATUS != 'N' AND IB.STATUS = 'Y' AND SC.MEM_NO = ? AND IBOARD_NO = ?

SELECT STATUS FROM ( SELECT CREATE_DATE, SCRAP_NO, IBOARD_NO, SC.STATUS FROM TB_SCRAP SC JOIN TB_ITEMBOARD IB ON SC.IBOARD_NO = IB.BOARD_NO JOIN TB_MEMBER MEM ON SC.MEM_NO = MEM.MEM_NO WHERE MEM.STATUS != 'N' AND IB.STATUS = 'Y' AND SC.MEM_NO = ? AND IBOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
UPDATE TB_SCRAP SET STATUS = ? , CREATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND IBOARD_NO = ?
